release.description: Digital DJ, Reorganizer, Wikipedia, Korean langpack
release.action: Digital DJ feature
Collection reorganizer with pattern
Wikipedia View (Windows only)
Korean langpack
CDDB retagging available for albums in addition to directories
Statistics View upgrades
Now possible to perform fast refreshes manualy
Many quality agent improvements + anonymization (thanks Jerome Fortain)
Device wizard now directly accessible from device toolbar (thanks Jerome Fortain)
New editable switch button in table views (thanks Jerome Fortain)
Using of stars for rating in tables. Actual value is accessible using tooltips (thanks Jerome Fortain)
Devices path and type now editable: possible to move a device without recreating it (thanks Jerome Fortain)
Better cross-fade experience (no more volume gaps)
Artists auto-completed combo boxes (in edition mode) in tables and in Properties wizard

Volume and position control with mouse wheel
Remember selected Parameters view tab
Animation view in Player perspective with 3 text styles and auto-resize
[Covers] More information displayed : index and search icon
[Covers] Shuffle cover and change cover at each track

[Covers] Accuracy now directly in the Cover view and it is stored individualy for each cover view

[Covers] Pre-load cover option in Parameter view / Cover tab
[Covers] New accuracy levels : album and track
[Covers] New Adapt cover option in Parameter view / Cover tab

Dynamic look and feel change
[Covers] Now setting default cover is just logical and file is no more overwritten on disk if changed

[Covers] Now accuracy level is all covers in any directory is displayed for a matching track

release.description: Auto-cover, many fixes and new features
release.action: Auto-cover grabbing from Web, can be configured in the Parameter View / Covers tab
RFE 962688 Save geometry windows
RFE 966736 Tray for both Windows and Linux
New special function in the command panel : Novelties plays recently added tracks, can be configured in the Parameter View / Option tab
New special function in the command panel : Continue in the current album to stop shuffle and listen a complete album
New perspective: Player with cover view and some more views in next releases
IzPack installer upgrade, Liquid look and feel and many look improvements
RFE 981210 A new option for set collection file encoding : UTF-8 or UTF-16
New options in Parameter View / Advanced tab : backup options
New Look and feel : Metouia
New view : Animation (work in progress)
New parameter tab with a function to reset perspectives defaults
New option in Parameter View / Option tab : search in unmounted devices used by the search box
Three new startup / systray modes : bestof, novelties and last track keep position (new default)
New tab in Parameter View : Network configuration used by auto-cover and soon P2P
Many usability and look improvements
Parameter view now uses tabs
Now file choosers try to guess a right root directory
New repeat mode button behaviour : repeat current track, not next one
Now even files on unmounted devices are displayed in history
For design, it's no more possible to create a device subdirectory of another device
For design, it's not more possible to change a device name, id or type
[Perf] Better performances when switching from a perspective to another
[Perf] Much faster to start playing at startup
[Perf] The global shuffle is much faster
Regexp option is now in Parameter View / Advanced tab
Table filter now supports * joker when regexp option is disabled (default)
Better handling of errors (able to restart FIFO)
The history doesn't show any more several times the same track successively
More debug traces, logging classes refactored
Now a Previous in command bar keeps previous selection
Now repeat selection is correctly displayed in queue playlist editor
1001432 We shouldn't be able to choose a startup file in parameter view if this mode is not selected
1003760 A rewind or a forward should resume a paused track
1003759 Cannot start tracks after stopping the player during a pause
984868 Should ignore pause between 2 tracks
1004106 Systray pause not taken into account in main window

Many fixes for bugs discovered during 0.3 qualification and not referenced in SF tracker

986301 Cannot create new devices
Now possible to add an entire device in playlist editor with drag and drop
RFE 973052 Automaticaly unmount a device for remove
Come back to UTF-8 to store collection file
[Linux] Changes in unmount to take in to account Linux 2.6
You can now create a void device
Display a warning if you want to refresh a void device
Migrated i18n files and sources to UTF-8 encoding. Now UTF-8 is the only accepted encoding
[Windows] The display jajuk at startup option in systray now uses a checkable menu item
